about_the_game:
Is your RPG lacking some adorable but perilous pixelated magic?

Well, look no further, TinyRPG - VFX Pack I will cover all your basic needs!

 

In this pack one will find:

 

■ 25 Special Effects;

 

       ■ 3 Slashing Attacks;

       ■ 3 Hit Effects;

       ■ 3 Protection Spells;

       ■ 2 Claw Attacks;

       ■ 2 Flame Spells;

       ■ 2 Water Spells;

       ■ 2 Earth Spells;

       ■ 2 Thunder Spells;

       ■ 2 Healing Spells;

       ■ 1 Mute Effect;

       ■ 1 Haste Effect;

       ■ 1 Slow Effect;

       ■ 1 Poison Effect;

 

Mix and match the effects to create stunning visuals, bringing back the might of the 90's jRPGS!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 

【animations (25 sheets)】

 

Reference:

 -------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
